entry.title: Up and running. At last...
entry.content:
First. A big thank you to Lars Wilhelmsen who showed me how to get a blog in just a few hours. It's hosted on GitHub using Octopress.

During the session a lot of git-commands, rake-stuff and some crazy voodoo made it possible. It wasn't too difficult, and it's easy to find documentation on how to do it. But a helping hand from someone that's already done it helps a lot.

So now I'm writing my first post using Sublime Text 2 and the Ocropress addon. As you can see I've found out how to create links in markdown. Check this guide if u're a noob like me.

Watch this one if u're having Error 37 problems in Diablo 3.
